name: Far Cry Insanity Bundle
summary: Experience the thrill of the award-winning Far Cry franchise through the Insanity Bundle. Travel to the exotic Rook Islands, survive the hills of Kyrat, and help save the land of the free in Hope County, Montana! Take on three twisted villains including Vaas, Pagan Min, and Joseph Seed in this trilogy pack that includes Far Cry 3 Classic Edition, Far Cry 4, and Far Cry 5.
